name: Quadraphonic Mixer
description: This algorithm is based on the disting EX quadraphonic mixer. It functions as a quadraphonic mixer with four outputs for four speakers (front left, front right, rear left, and rear right) instead of the usual two for stereo mixers. The algorithm includes features like spinners and orbiters to manipulate audio positioning in 3D space, allowing users to rotate audio around the audience. It supports both rectangular and polar coordinate systems for channel positioning.
short_description: A quadraphonic mixer with four speaker outputs, supporting spatial audio manipulation via spinners and orbiters.
use_cases: Quadraphonic sound mixing for surround sound setups
Spatial effects and dynamic audio panning
gui_description: The GUI displays a mixer view with four outputs when on the common parameters page. Per-channel views show graphical representations of channel positions within the quadraphonic field, including rectangular or polar coordinate visualizations.

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: If using Rectangular coordinates, the channel’s X position, from left (-100%) to right (100%).

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: If using Rectangular coordinates, the channel’s Y position, from rear (-100%) to front (100%).

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: If using Polar coordinates, the channel’s angle, where 0 is front center and ±180 is rear center.

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: If using Polar coordinates, the channel’s radius, where 0% is center and 100% is maximum distance from center.

parameters.name: Spin rate
parameters.description: The rate of spin to apply.

parameters.name: Orbit phase
parameters.description: Sets the phase angle to add to the orbiter. Different inputs with the same orbiter but different phases follow each other around the circle at a fixed offset.

output_ports.description: Output for the front left speaker.
